vulnerable_road_users.description: two medium-sized dogs, appearing to be stray, crossing the road from left to right approximately 50 meters ahead of the ego car
vulnerable_road_users.explanation: the dogs are directly in the path of the ego car and could cause a collision or require the vehicle to take evasive action

traffic lights.description: Two traffic lights showing a green signal, positioned above the roadway ahead of the ego car
traffic lights.explanation: the green traffic lights indicate that the ego car has the right of way to continue forward

general_perception.description and explanation: The image shows two medium-sized dogs, appearing to be stray, crossing the road from left to right approximately 50 meters ahead of the ego car. These dogs are directly in the path of the ego car and could cause a collision or require the vehicle to take evasive action. Additionally, there are two traffic lights above the roadway ahead of the ego car, both showing a green signal. The green traffic lights indicate that the ego car has the right of way to continue forward.

1.description and explanation: This object is a dog. It is positioned in the left lane of the road, facing the direction of the oncoming traffic, which could pose a potential hazard to vehicles. The presence of an animal on the road necessitates cautious and slower driving from the ego car to avoid collision and ensure the safety of the animal and the occupants of the vehicle.

2.description and explanation: This object is a dog located on the road. The presence of the dog in the driving path of the ego car poses a potential hazard. The driver should slow down and prepare to stop or maneuver around the animal to avoid a collision. This requires alertness and readiness to adapt to sudden changes, ensuring safety for both the animal and the occupants of the car.

driving_suggestion: Reduce speed immediately and prepare to stop or steer gently around the dogs if safe to do so, while being prepared for their unpredictable movements. Continue to observe the traffic lights which are currently green, but remain attentive in case they change as the vehicle approaches. Keep an eye out for potential black ice due to recent snowfall. Continue driving with caution.
